messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] missing the little ones
messages.msgSnippet: ... Back when we lived in Montana, and my son s age was counted in weeks, there was a woman at church who always sat in the back pew, and always wanted to hold
messages.messageBody:
> My 'baby' will be 2 in a couple of weeks and it's on my mind that although
> she's 'only' two, she's already two!!!! I can't imagine not having a little
> one around.

Back when we lived in Montana, and my son's age was counted in weeks, there
was a woman at church who always sat in the back pew, and always wanted to
hold Tim. Her own "baby" was 2 and she missed that cuddly baby age. I
still wish I had a picture of it, because the woman was Andie MacDowell, and
her baby, Sarah Margaret, is now 8.

It's my little, tiny, brush with fame.

brenda
